code: /** * Creates a new REST API Event * Driven Consumer, which provides API listing of the REST services * * @param camelContext the camel context * @param processor the processor * @param contextPath the context-path * @param parameters additional parameters * * @return a newly created REST API consumer * @throws Exception can be thrown */ Consumer createApiConsumer(CamelContext camelContext, Processor processor, String contextPath, RestConfiguration configuration, Map parameters) throws Exception.
